original_title: Algo así como una historia de amor
overview: Jaime is a young writer who just published his first novel called "Don't Fall in Love with Her", a book based on his relationship with his ex-girlfriend, Laura, from whom he still has feelings for. His plans to get her back will be ruined when he finds out that his childhood best friend, Vega, is his ex-girlfriend's new boyfriend.
title: Something Like a Love Story
